original_text: Then Daniel replied with prudence and discretion to Arioch, the captain of the king's guard, who had gone out to kill the wise men of Babylon.
korean_text: 그 때에 왕의 근위대장 아리옥이 바벨론 지혜자들을 죽이러 나가매 다니엘이 명철하고 슬기로운 말로

sentences.original_text: Then Daniel replied with prudence and discretion
the captain of the king's guard
who had gone out to kill the wise men of Babylon
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 바벨론의 현인들을 죽이러 나가 있었습니다
